$default.query: select Id from ${type} where ${nameField} = '${name}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

ConnectedApp.query: select id from ConnectedApplication where Name = '${metadata.label}'

Document.query: select Id from ${type} where ${nameField} = '${name.split('/').pop()}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

DuplicateRule.query: select Id from ${type} where ${nameField} = '${fullName.split('.').pop()}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

EmailTemplate.query: select Id from ${type} where ${nameField} = '${fullName.split('/').pop()}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

CustomField.query: select Id from ${type} where ${nameField} = '${name.split('.').pop().split('__').shift()}' and EntityDefinitionId = '${fullName.split('.').shift()}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

CustomMetadataObject.query: select Id from CustomObject where ${nameField} = '${name.split('__').shift()}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

CustomMetadataField.query: select Id from ${type} where ${nameField} = '${name.split('.').pop().split('__').shift()}' and EntityDefinitionId = '${fullName.split('.').shift()}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

Queue.query: select Id from Group where ${nameField} = '${name}' and Type = 'Queue'

QuickAction.query: select Id from QuickActionDefinition where ${nameField} = '${name.split('.').pop()}' and SobjectType = '${name.split('.').shift()}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

LetterHead.query: select Id from ${type} where ${nameField} = '${name}' and NamespacePrefix = '${namespace}'

StandardValueSet.query: select Id from StandardValueSet where MasterLabel = '${name}'
